channel.title: how do i create a mod with source SDK 2013?
channel.description:
going to keep this short
valve phased out the old source SDK launcher, and with it the create a mod wizard to make a mod and directory, and i have no clue on how to create my own custom mod without it.
I've downloaded the source code from github but i have no idea what to do with it, and valve has nothing useful on their developer community wiki.
so can someone give me some instructions? also I'm using content from HL2 and it's episodes if that's important
